page.title: 07WESTROP SURGERY,HIGHWORTH
page.content: The Westrop surgery in Highworth was built in 1970.It was extended in 1976 and again in 1981.It covers a{five {mile}radius.There is an ambulance parking space but it is not used very ofen.From Monday to Friday the surgery is open from eight forty five in the morning to seven at night.There are four doctors.The doctors are Doctor Andrews,Doctor Cocks,Doctor Fullagar and Doctor Metcalfe,who is the only woman doctor.There are no specialists.Also working at the surgery are two practice nurses.The surgery is run by a secretary,four clerk typists and two cleaners.Most of the patients pay to the N.H.Only a few patients pay privately.There are{9,600 patients altogether.
